item.description:
Please join the Wedeln Ski & Outdoors Club and its members the weekend of October 17-18th for a Fall Foliage weekend in the White Mountains of New Hampshire.

Schedule:

• Arrive Friday night anytime after 6:00PM. Beer & Sangria from 9-Midnight with assorted snacks
• Saturday we will Hike somewhere moderate in the White Mountains (exact location to be determined based on weather, etc). We will depart for the hike from the Wedeln Ski Club around 8:30AM
• The hike should take around 5 hours and a relaxing cookout is planned to follow beginning at 5:30PM
• Sunday, for those interested we will plan a short hike and/or 25 mile bike ride around North Conway and/or some 'exploration time' around the area. Again, all this will be weather dependent.

Food:

Breakfast:
SATURDAY: Served from 7-8:15AM Cost $3/per person
• Continental (assorted breads, muffins, bagels)
• Coffee, Orange Juice
SUNDAY: Served from 8:30-10AM Cost $5/per person
• Eggs, Bacon, toast, etc
• Coffee, Orange Juice

Dinner:
SATURDAY: begins at 5:30PM Cost $25/per person
• Beer, Wine & Soda
• Hamburgers, Cheeseburgers, Chicken breasts, BBQ Ribs, veggie burgers
• Potato Salad & Garden Salad
• Cookies

Overnight Accommodations:
Wedeln Ski & Sports Club, Bartlett, NH $20/night/person
21+ only, no kids, no pets

Getting There:

For directions to the Wedeln Ski & Outdoors Club &
more information: www.wedeln.com

See attached flyer for full details on the hike

PLEASE RSVP no later than Wednesday October 14, 2008 at midnight so we know how much food to prepare for the weekend.
item.name: Fall Foliage Hiking Weekend
